#summary Showcase implemented with grails and smart gwt

= Technologies = 

== View ==
 * [http://code.google.com/webtoolkit/download.html GWT 2.0.4]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/smartgwt/downloads/list SmartGwt 2.2]

== Service ==
 * [http://www.grails.org Grails 1.3.4]

== Persistence == 
 * [http://www.grails.org Grails 1.3.4]

= Start up help =

 # Download and install [http://www.grails.org/download/archive/Grails Grails 1.3.4]
 # Download and install [http://code.google.com/webtoolkit/download.htmls GWT 2.0.4] (Set GWT_HOME)
 # Checkout project
 # Open terminal and go to directory 'web/grails-smartgwt/'
 # Start the app with 'grails run-app' (This will start the needed Grails Services and Controllers)
 # Compile the SmartGWT Frontend Code with 'grails compile-gwt-modules'
 # Start the Frontend in hosted mode: 'grails run-gwt-client'
 # Open your browser and go to http://localhost:8080/smartgwtsc/ (or just click the 'Launch Default Browser' Button in the GWT Dev Console window)
